jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
● Mentoring junior front-end developers 
● Solving complex UI Designs and Human-Computer Interaction with Web UI 
● Documenting technical issue related to front-end works to be passed on juniors or other new recruits 
● Participating in project planing with other teams (both internal and external) 
● Participating in interviewing new front-end recruits
jobsJson.description:
● Mentoring junior front-end developers
● Solving complex UI Designs and Human-Computer Interaction with Web UI
● Documenting technical issue related to front-end works to be passed on juniors or other new recruits
● Participating in project planing with other teams (both internal and external)

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Additional (not mandatory, but is a plus if they had) Skills:
  • Tool Usage (able to use but not mandatory - is a plus if they did):
  • HTML5
  • CSS3 (able to code in SCSS)
  • Javascript
  • Git
  • jQuery
  • Python
  • Django
  • Gulp/Webpack
  • CSS3 Animation
  • Javascript Animation
  • React JS or Vue JS or Angular JS
  • PostgresSQL
  • Sketch
  • Sublime Text or Visual Studio Code
  • JIRA, Trello
  • Source Tree
  • Slack
  • Illustrator, Photoshop
